_instructions.note: Copy this file to secrets.json and fill in your actual credentials

github.GITHUB_PERSONAL_ACCESS_TOKEN: Get from: https://github.com/settings/tokens - Required scopes: repo, read:packages, read:org

context7.CONTEXT7_API_KEY: Optional - Get from https://context7.com for higher rate limits

supabase.SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY: Get from: https://app.supabase.com/project/_/settings/api - Service Role Key (WARNING: Keep this secret!)
